EL PASO, Texas (KVIA) -- An El Paso-based TV show premieres tomorrow on Netflix. "Tex-Mex Motors" follows car enthusiasts Marcos "Scooter" Carrera and Rob "Rabbit" Pitts.
The pair own a business sca… [+654 chars]
